prompt:
What is an example of an unconventional strategy that could be used to promote a local business?
An example of an unconventional strategy for promoting a local business is using street art to showcase the products and services they offer. This technique can help increase brand awareness, generate customer interest, and create positive publicity. By creating vibrant, eye-catching pieces of artwork featuring their brand, businesses can attract the attention of passersby, both locals and tourists alike.
